name: DRICopilot NextGen
description: The workflow consist of  a master ai agent primary resolving incoming queries and uses an expert group of proxy agents to delegate tasks.

config.name: DRICopilot_Master
config.system_message:
Capabilities:

Aggregation and synthesis of insights from the Data Analyzer, Diagnostic Tool, and Communication Facilitator.
Decision-making support to prioritize responses and allocate resources.
Coordination of response efforts, tracking progress, and adjusting strategies as needed.
Reporting on incident resolution progress and outcomes to stakeholders.

Integration Points:

Receives analyzed data, diagnostic reports, and communication updates from the respective agents.
Outputs decisions, action plans, and updates to all agents and relevant stakeholders.
config.description: Acts as the central command, coordinating insights from all tool agents to formulate a comprehensive response strategy. It waits on expert group agents for information on a specific area before replying

config.name: DRI_ExpertGroup
config.system_message:
For call routing information, delegate task to DRI_CallRoutingExpert.
For Hoops information, delegate task to DRI_HoopsExpert.
config.default_auto_reply: Finding the right agent and delegating task
config.description: This acts as a group chat manager, You are a helpful assistant skilled at coordinating a group of other assistants to solve a task. You need to complete the execution before replying back to master

config.name: DRI_HoopsExpert
config.system_message:
Invoke the following skills according to following mapping information. You have to wait for the skills execution to finish before replying back:
1. hoops_period_skill : for getting Hours of Operation or Hoops Period or schedule
2, day_exceptions_hoops_skill : for getting days of exceptions in hoops period
3. call_routing_classification_skill : for getting call routing classifications
4. call_routing_exceptionpolicies_skill : for getting exception policies for call routing info
config.description: A user proxy agent that captures following configuration information using skills and analyzes raw data, You can invoke associated  skills as python functions.

skills.title: hoops_period_skill
skills.content:
import time
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class TestHoops():
  def setup_method(self, url):
    self.driver = webdriver.Edge()
    self.vars = {}
    self.url = url
  
  def teardown_method(self):
    self.driver.quit()
  
  def test_hoops(self):
    self.driver.get(self.url)        
    self.driver.set_window_size(1936, 1048)
    time.sleep(20)

    row_data = []
    while True:
        table_info = self.driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, "div.ms-List-page")
        row_details = table_info.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR,"div.ms-DetailsRow-fields")
        
        for row in row_details:
            column_details = row.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR,'span[class^="css-"]')
            column_data = []
            for column in column_details:
                column_data.append(column.text.strip())
            row_data.append(column_data)

        next_button = self.driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, 'button.ms-Button[title="Next"]')
        if next_button.get_attribute('disabled') is not None:
            break
        next_button.click()
        time.sleep(2)
    
    return row_data

url= "https://contactcenter.microsoft.com/Hoops/HoopPeriods"
test = TestHoops()
test.setup_method(url)
test.test_hoops()
test.teardown_method()

skills.title: day_exceptions_hoops__skill

import time
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class TestHoops():
  def setup_method(self, url):
    self.driver = webdriver.Edge()
    self.vars = {}
    self.url = url
  
  def teardown_method(self):
    self.driver.quit()
  
  def test_hoops(self):
    self.driver.get(self.url)        
    self.driver.set_window_size(1936, 1048)
    time.sleep(10)

    row_data = []
    while True:
        table_info = self.driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, "div.ms-List-page")
        row_details = table_info.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR,"div.ms-DetailsRow-fields")
        
        for row in row_details:
            column_details = row.find_elements(By.CSS_SELECTOR,'span[class^="css-"]')
            column_data = []
            for column in column_details:
                column_data.append(column.text.strip())
            row_data.append(column_data)

        next_button = self.driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, 'button.ms-Button[title="Next"]')
        if next_button.get_attribute('disabled') is not None:
            break
        next_button.click()
        time.sleep(2)
    
    return row_data

url= "https://contactcenter.microsoft.com/Hoops/DayExceptions"  
test = TestHoops()
test.setup_method(url)
test.test_hoops()
test.teardown_method()
